official_title: A Phase 1b, Open-Label, Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy Study of HC- 7366 in Combination With Belzutifan (WELIREGâ„¢) in Patients With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
inclusion_criteria:
* Has diagnosis of locally advanced (inoperable) or metastatic RCC with a predominant clear cell component
* Be age 18 years or older (male or female) at the time of consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
